titles.title: Anti-PLO Terrorism Act of 1987
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for aiding the Palestine Liberation Organization.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 4/29/1987--Introduced. Anti-PLO Terrorism Act of 1987 - Amends the Federal criminal code to impose criminal penalties for aiding or abetting the Palestine Liberation Organization.
